This renders TiKZ diagrams in markdown.

::: {#fig-example .test-class}
```{.tikz}
%%| caption: "My Diagram"
%%| filename: "my-diagram"
%%| fig-attr:
%%|   id: fig-my-diagram
%%|   class: my-class
% TikZ code here
\node[draw, circle] (A) at (0,0) {A};
\node[draw, circle] (B) at (2,2) {B};
\draw[->] (A) -- (B);
:::

See, that was not so bad.
